mapper.select: select h.edu_hisno, to_char(e.edu_start,'yyyymmdd') as edu_start, to_char(e.edu_end,'yyyymmdd') as edu_end, h.attendance from edu_history h, edu e where h.edu_no = e.edu_no and attendance < 100 and edu_start < sysdate

select count(*) from employee e, edu d, edu_history h, department dept where e.emp_no = h.emp_no and d.edu_no = h.edu_no and dept.dept_no = e.dept_no
and d.edu_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and h.emp_no = #{keyword}
and e.emp_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select edu_no, edu_start, edu_end from edu where edu_end+1 > SYSDATE
